problem_summary_simple: Calculate a value by concatenating and summing elements from the ends of an array until it's empty.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively concatenates first and last elements, summing their values, until the array is empty. Handles odd/even lengths.
key_insights: The core idea is to pair elements from the start and end of the array.
Concatenation can be achieved mathematically by multiplying the first number by a power of 10.
The power of 10 depends on the number of digits in the second number.
